subject: Dear  Beneficiary,
body:
Dear  Beneficiary,
The death and burial of  Her Majesty  the Queen had equally corroborated
the discovery of massive fraud perpetrated by
Ghanaian officials to the tune of several Millions of British Pounds. The
discovery which is also being investigated by SFO,UK
equally led to the  discovery of hidden  funds diverted by government
officials and Banks from Africa which ranges from  Inheritance, Contract
Claims ,Compensations ETC.The large sum were majorly aided and abetted by
former serving officials from Africa with their overseas counterpart.
The Authority in the UK made it known that they were not repatriating the
funds back to Africa or any other place because of too much corruptions in
Africa so, they made all the government officials to accept the
recommendation of SFO- Serious Fraud Office to demand for the special
softwares so as to trace all the beneficiaries and order for their release
immediately,This is why I am contacting you as a human rights lawyer
working with Ghana Ministry of Justice.
You need to contact SFO,UK Liaison Dublin,Republic of Ireland  with this
Identification Number(RT/RK99191/ZTM/2022)to pay
and secure the government fiat which covers  Payment Permit/ Consent Release
order so that they can direct you to the bank that will pay you immediately
so that you can open communication with the bank.
As a human right lawyer, we had meeting with the chancery officials,SFO
officials and other top government officials from Africa that signed the
witness order so I was informed to educate you on the requirement :
1)You are getting payment of supplementary sum/amount if you do not have
any documentary proof of your payment in the past either inheritance,
contracts or compensation etc.
2)You will need to supply all your details in order to prove that you are
the real owner of this email.
3)You are to pay for the payment permit/Consent Release Order to SFO,and
get a certified paper to discuss the modality of your payment with the bank.
Note: SFO is not a bank so there is no provision for deduction of this
Consent Release Order.It is a joint agreed paper which will ensure that you
get paid speedily without any local or international stop orders from
anywhere.
Your urgent response and co-operation is needed.
Yours Sincerely,
Barrister Kojo E.Amaglo Esq,
Human Right Lawyer/Activists,
Representing Non Indigenous Beneficiaries .
Ghana Ministry of Justice.

subject: Re:   Dear  Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Barrister Kojo Esq,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite a situation, isn't it? I must say, the details are a bit overwhelming.

I'm curious about the process you've described. Could you perhaps explain more about how these funds were discovered? And why is it that they can't be returned to Africa?

Also, could you clarify what exactly the Payment Permit Consent Release Order is? How does one go about obtaining such a document?

Lastly, I'm not sure I understand why my personal details would be needed to prove ownership of my email. Could you elaborate on this point?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: THIS EXPLANATION IS AS SIMPLE AS A,B,C.
body:
Dear   Beneficiary,

Well,I work with the Ministry of justice and I am a human rights activist
and independent attorney in charge of foreign beneficiaries whose funds are
abandoned.

You fall into the category of these beneficiaries:You either have
inheritance,compensation or contracts claims etc. You should know better.
The disc which was recovered by the ministry of finance had only emails
after the hackers introduced a terrible virus to hack the government
database. This is how we recovered your email.

Please, note that it is your responsibility to provide us with a valid
document showing your exact payment amount.Whereby you do not have such a
document,you will only receive the random sum of $5M mapped out for all the
affected beneficiaries whose emails were recovered. This is the bit of a
background story and you should be able to understand this now.

Finally, you need to provide us your full names, telephone, valid id such
as driving license or passport,next of kin and receiving bank particulars
to enable us process the payment permit which covers the Foreign
Allocation/Exchange control fee. If you do not understand payment consent
release order ,you should be able to understand Foreign Allocation/Exchange
control fee .It is the same thing. A form will be provided to you to fill
and return and with your details ,we shall confirm the exact sum you are to
pay for this to enable a direct credit of your account. Aside from this
bank transfer, you also have the opportunity to receive your payment
through Bitcoin, Cashier check or Certified Bank's draft depending on your
choice.

Kindly follow these directives so that we can conclude this transaction
between now and early next week.

Thank you and best regards,
